name: Cube Control (FutureStyleGames)
description:
This is a simple platformer, but you have to collect some orbs to unlock the door. Every time you collect one, your control changes so it is tricky to move to the right direction. Every orb changes your control differently.

Control:

Move: WASD

Jump: Space

However, the control changes every time you collect an orb!

This game was created in 48h in the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

#GMTKGameJam2020

#OutOfControl
